text: Ainsley Harriott (born 28 February 1957) is a British celebrity chef, television presenter and entertainer. He is known for his BBC cooking shows Ready Steady Cook (1994–2010) and Can't Cook, Won't Cook (1995–2000). In 2013, he was a contestant on Strictly Come Dancing. Harriott was born in Paddington, London. His father was the Jamaican-born pianist Chester Harriott (1933–2013). He is separated from his wife Clare Fellows. The couple have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Black British people Category:British chefs Category:People from Paddington Category:Television personalities from London
title: Ainsley Harriott
